metadata.title: Gildan Men's Short Sleeve 4-Pack Cotton Jersey T-Shirt, White, X-Large
features: Taped neck and shoulders for durability
Double needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: Gildan uses superior-quality fabric that reduces shrinkage, lasts longer and provides greater comfort. We add taping in the neck and shoulder seams of both our t-shirts and undershirts for greater durability and comfort. Gildan has an incredible array of colors and fits your body, style and personality perfectly. Gildan is one of the largest domestic consumers of U.S cotton, creating thousands of jobs in the U.S. economy.
